mail@nlohmann.me.message: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/nlohmann/json into develop

:white_check_mark: added progress output for Unicode tests

Travis aborts tests if they do not produce output for 10 minutes. This commit shall fix this.
:construction_worker: update Travis to use Ubuntu Trusty 14.04 images
:hammer: replaced lexer's error message by const char*
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/nlohmann/json into develop
:sparkles: accept functions to check if input is valid JSON #458

:hammer: trying to fix #367

Code from https://stackoverflow.com/a/44503794/266378 which is hopefully working with MSVC.

:bug: skipping BOM for iterators #602

I totally forgot about byte order marks in this scenario.
